document.full_text: thousands of syrians attending the funerals of pro-democracy protesters called on sunday for the removal of president bashar al-assad, witnesses said, in the latest outburst against his rule.
document.title: syrian protesters, mourners demand assad overthrow
lines_and_colors: thousands of syrians attending the funerals of pro-democracy protesters called on sunday for the removal of president bashar al-assad, witnesses said, in the latest outburst against his rule.
